content.question: After the block in system <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is released from rest, the time for the block to first reach a maximum speed is <math alttext="delta t sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. After the block in system <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></math> is released, the time for the block to first reach a maximum speed is

choices.label: <math alttext="delta t sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta t sub A times sine theta" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mtext> </mtext><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction delta t sub A over sine theta" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta t sub A times cosine theta" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mtext> </mtext><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction delta t sub A over cosine theta" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="delta t sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
